product_name: The North Face Denali Down Jacket - Men's - 2012 Closeout
long_description: The North Face Denali Down jacket uses heavyweight Polartec(R) fleece and adds lofty goose down insulation-just when you thought this iconic jacket couldn't get any better. Breathable Polartec(R) 300 Series fleece warms even when wet and dries quickly. Insulated at the shoulders and chest with a lofty, 550-fill-power goose down insulation for additional thermal warmth in the cold. Durable, abrasion-resistant 2-ply nylon fabric aids with wear and tear while carrying a pack. Elastic-bound cuffs and drawcord hem. 2 zip-secure hand pockets and a Napoleon chest pocket. Zip-in integration feature lets you zip the Denali Down jacket into compatible shells and parkas from The North Face. Closeout.
short_description: The North Face Denali Down jacket uses heavyweight Polartec(R) fleece and adds lofty goose down insulation-just when you thought this iconic jacket couldn't get any better.
